history.proof: intros x H. unfold leZ, oppZ in *. destruct x. - apply I. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall x : Z, leZ OZ x -> leZ (oppZ x) OZ

Premises:
leZ = fun x y : Z => match x with | OZ => match y with | neg _ => False | _ => True end | pos n => match y with | pos m => n <= m | _ => False end | neg n => match y with | neg m => m <= n | _ => True end end : Z -> Z -> Prop
oppZ = fun x : Z => match x with | OZ => OZ | pos n => neg n | neg n => pos n end : Z -> Z
Inductive Z : Set := OZ : Z | pos : nat -> Z | neg : nat -> Z Arguments pos _%nat_scope Arguments neg _%nat_scope
sign_absZ : forall x : Z, leZ OZ (absZ x)
tech_le_pos_abs : forall x : Z, leZ OZ x -> absZ x = x
leZ_antisymmetric = fun x y : Z => Z_ind (fun x0 : Z => leZ x0 y -> leZ y x0 -> x0 = y) (Z_ind (fun y0 : Z => leZ OZ y0 -> leZ y0 OZ -> OZ = y0) (fun _ _ : leZ OZ OZ => eq_refl) (fun (n : nat) (_ : leZ OZ (pos n)) (H0 : leZ (pos n) OZ) => False_ind (OZ = pos n) H0) (fun (n : nat) (H : leZ OZ (neg n)) (_ : leZ (neg n) OZ) => False_ind (OZ = neg n) H) y) (fun n : nat => Z_ind (fun y0 : Z => leZ (pos n) y0 -> leZ y0 (pos n) -> pos n = y0) (fun (H : leZ (pos n) OZ) (_ : leZ OZ (pos n)) => False_ind (pos n = OZ) H...
tech_posOZ_pos : forall n : nat, leZ OZ (posOZ n)
ltZ = fun x y : Z => leZ (succZ x) y : Z -> Z -> Prop
opp_succZ : forall x : Z, oppZ (succZ x) = predZ (oppZ x)
opp_predZ : forall x : Z, oppZ (predZ x) = succZ (oppZ x)
tech_lt_abs_OZ : forall x : Z, lt_absZ x (pos 0) -> x = OZ
add_OZ : forall x : Z, addZ x OZ = x
addZ_opposite = fun (x : Z) (_ : IdZ x) => conj I (conj I (conj match x as z return (addZ z (oppZ z) = OZ) with | OZ => eq_refl | pos n => tech_add_pos_negZ n | neg n => tech_add_neg_posZ n end match x as z return (addZ (oppZ z) z = OZ) with | OZ => eq_refl | pos n => tech_add_neg_posZ n | neg n => tech_add_pos_negZ n end)) : opposite Z IdZ addZ OZ oppZ
Z_sind : forall P : Z -> SProp, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_rect : forall P : Z -> Type, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_ind : forall P : Z -> Prop, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_rec : forall P : Z -> Set, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
succ_predZ : forall x : Z, succZ (predZ x) = x
pred_succZ : forall x : Z, predZ (succZ x) = x
addZ_eq1 : forall y : Z, addZ OZ y = y
absZ = fun x : Z => match x with | OZ => OZ | pos n | neg n => pos n end : Z -> Z
succ_pred_pred_succZ : forall x : Z, succZ (predZ x) = predZ (succZ x)
sgnZ = fun x : Z => match x with | OZ => OZ | pos _ => pos 0 | neg _ => neg 0 end : Z -> Z
succ_addZ_l : forall x y : Z, addZ (succZ x) y = succZ (addZ x y)
pred_addZ_l : forall x y : Z, addZ (predZ x) y = predZ (addZ x y)
succZ = fun x : Z => match x with | OZ => IZ | pos n => pos (S n) | neg 0 => OZ | neg (S m) => neg m end : Z -> Z
predZ = fun x : Z => match x with | OZ => neg 0 | pos 0 => OZ | pos (S m) => pos m | neg n => neg (S n) end : Z -> Z
Record almost_ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_art { ARadd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; ARadd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); ARadd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); ARmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; ARmul_0_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO; ARmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); ARmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z); ARdistr_l : forall x y z : R, req...
addZ_neutral = conj I (fun (x : Z) (_ : IdZ x) => conj (add_OZ x) eq_refl) : neutral Z IdZ addZ OZ
Record ring_morph (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R) : Prop := mkmorph { morph0 : req (phi cO) rO; morph1 : req (phi cI) rI; morph_add : forall x y : C, req (phi (cadd x y)) (radd (phi x) (phi y)); morph_sub : forall x y : C, req (phi (csub x y)) (rsub (phi x) (phi y)); morph_mul : forall x y : C, req (phi (cmul x y)) (rmul (phi x) (phi y)); morph_opp : forall x : C, req (phi (copp x)) (ropp (phi x)); morph_eq...
add_IZ_succZ : forall x : Z, addZ x IZ = succZ x
ARmul_1_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x
ssrbool.homoRL : forall (aT rT : Type) (f : aT -> rT) (g : rT -> aT) (aR : ssrbool.rel aT) (rR : ssrbool.rel rT), ssrfun.cancel g f -> ssrfun.homomorphism_2 f (fun x y : aT => is_true (aR x y)) (fun x y : rT => is_true (rR x y)) -> forall (x : rT) (y : aT), is_true (aR (g x) y) -> is_true (rR x (f y))
add_mIZ_predZ : forall x : Z, addZ x (neg 0) = predZ x
ARmul_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)
ARopp_mul_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (ropp (rmul x y)) (rmul (ropp x) y)
succ_addZ_r : forall x y : Z, addZ x (succZ y) = succZ (addZ x y)
abs_eq_or_oppZ : forall x : Z, {absZ x = x} + {absZ x = oppZ x}
pred_addZ_r : forall x y : Z, addZ x (predZ y) = predZ (addZ x y)
tech_add_pos_negZ : forall n : nat, addZ (pos n) (neg n) = OZ
tech_add_neg_posZ : forall n : nat, addZ (neg n) (pos n) = OZ
ARmul_0_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO
ARdistr_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul z (radd x y)) (radd (rmul z x) (rmul z y))

```coq
intros x H.
unfold leZ, oppZ in *.
destruct x.
- intros _. exact I.
- intros Hl. destruct x.
  + discriminate.
  + simpl in Hl. apply Nat.le_antisymm. apply Hl. apply tech_le_pos_abs. exact H.
  + simpl. auto.
Qed.
Qed.```
